email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the laycan? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $48.00 per metric ton? The laycan for the MV Ocean Star is October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.00 is still a bit high for us. Could you do $47.00? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? The laycan works for us. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can do $47.00 per metric ton, but that’s really our bottom line. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if we can proceed with these terms. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $47.00 works for us. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star for the Houston to Rotterdam shipment. Please send over the contract for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll have the contract drafted and sent over by end of day. The laycan remains October 20-25, and the demurrage rate is $15,000 per day. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
